firestore.reasoning: Given the frontend-only nature of the ChronoHabits 2025 application and the absence of user authentication or a backend server, Firestore is not applicable. The user explicitly states local storage (LocalStorage or IndexedDB) as the persistence mechanism. Therefore, a Firestore data structure is irrelevant in this context. The request to store data on GitHub is also unrelated to Firestore database design. This application architecture inherently avoids all concerns about authorization independence and QAPs, since there is no backend at all.
